job description:
Job Description
Job Position - Data Scientist

Location - DFW, Texas

Duration - 12 months

Job Description:
  • Ph.D. or Master’s degree in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Applied Mathematics,
  • Computer Science or a related field
  • Ph.D is preferred but Master’s degree with experience will be considered
  • Strong programing skills in R, Python, Hadoop
  • Practical experience applying quantitative techniques to solve real-world problems
  • Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal communication skills
  • Ability to identify underlying problems and appropriate techniques for solving them
  • Ability to manipulate and extract information from very large, complex data sets

Company Description
Great work environment, lots of room for growth and great company culture.
